EmailTemplate.name: Close Accounts - Account Retention
EmailTemplate.subject: Inquiry {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
We regret to hear that you are considering closing your account. Before I officially submit the closeout request I would appreciate it if you would provide me some feedback regarding our products, rates, processes or services so I can personally address any concerns and look into solutions that might work better for you.
Please reply to this message at your soonest convenience and let me know if there are any questions I can answer for you about Axos Bank.
Thank you for your time and we look forward to your reply.
Best Regards,
{!User.FirstName} Axos Bank Customer Service
